string-array.name: error_messages
string-array.item: The deviceUUID and nodeId does not match (only for devices that have already requested a nodeId)
Name length must be less than 40 chars
Password length between 8 and 32 chars, at least on capital char and one digit
This account already exists.
Email must contain “@” and “.domain” (sebi@paranteze.com format)
24 hours since token generation passed
The token provided was not generated by the server (or was already used and deleted)
Invalid email/username + password combination
User does not exist
User does not have a channel associated (for example: before he confirm the email address)
Username taken.
Invalid username format
You have reached the 5 allowed username changes.
Your old password was entered incorrectly. Please enter it again.
Length between 8 and 32 chars, at least on capital char and one digit
Password must be different from existing or old passwords
You can\'t use a password you have used before.
Too many password changes
User preferences entity no longer exists
